Genomics_ConceptTask.TEXT: Our findings provide a rationale for the establishment of new homeostasis of gut microbiota that thus contributes to improving neural and immune function as well as extending life span. Given the impossibility of performing a longitudinal longevity cohort in human, further studies based on animal experiments are needed to understand whether the interaction of immune response, amino acid metabolic activity, and candidate bacteria involved in the establishment of a new homeostasis with aging that thus promoting human longevity.
